interfaces_external_systems.description: Defines integration points between SDP and external telecom/billing/network systems.

interfaces.description: Handles SMS MO/MT delivery and receipts
Handles MMS MO/MT delivery and reports
Handles USSD MO/MT sessions and prepaid interactions
Provides charging, prepaid credit management, and topup functions
Apps communicate with SDP via SOAP/HTTP APIs
Exports CDR and SLA reports for analysis

requirements.REQ-INT-1: All interfaces comply with respective telecom standards (SMPP 3.4/5.0, MM7, WAP SI/SL, USSD MAP)
requirements.REQ-INT-2: Supports failover routing between primary and secondary external systems
requirements.REQ-INT-3: Interfaces monitored via Alert Module for failures
requirements.REQ-INT-4: All interactions logged in CDR Module
